name: Kitty Cat Detective Taz: The Eviction Crisis
name_original: Kitty Cat Detective Taz: The Eviction Crisis
description: A small mystery game for all ages! Help this all-star cast of cats discover what is so wrong with their friends apartment complex in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic. Learn about the Eviction Crisis and what you can do to help! This is an educational text based adventure game.
